author: @oldsmar1983
text: If you still cannot get Pylint to work after installing and reloading your environment, add the code below to the your user settings.json file...  ctrl + shift + p  Select settings.json  "python.linting.enabled": true, "python.linting.pylintEnabled": true, "python.linting.pylintUseMinimalCheckers": false,
